Class Admin

java.lang.Object
Admin
public class Admin extends Object
Admin Class here we define the admin class which is responsible for managing the pets and customers. It includes methods for adding, removing, and editing pets, as well as approving or denying adoption requests.

    • approveAdoption

      public boolean approveAdoption(String customerID, String petID, List<AdoptionRequest> requests)
      here we define the approveAdoption method which approves the adoption of a pet by a customer.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID of the customer who wants to adopt the pet
      petID - the ID of the pet to be adopted
      requests - the list of adoption requests
      Returns:
      true if the adoption is approved, false otherwise

      here we define the denyAdoption method which denies the adoption of a pet by a customer.

      petID - the ID of the pet to be adopted
